poem.title: The Ice-cream Cone Belongs to Me
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: From a land of rancid rites You're tired of rice in begging bowls, Piss-poor poets and pisspot songs So you writes to the man: To go with the obligations, we want rights And big-league earnings, huh? A shipwright's ransom. Give me the free beer, you dull dumb-asses.
